heading: HB08097
0: AN ACT URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO SET FISH AND MEAT TARIFFS TO ZERO, TO COMBAT INFLATION RATE HIKE, TO EASE FINANCIAL CONSTRAINTS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2018-08-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08097
FULL TITLE : AN ACT URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO SET FISH AND MEAT TARIFFS TO ZERO, TO COMBAT INFLATION RATE HIKE, TO EASE FINANCIAL CONSTRAINTS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Mandates the industries, businesses and offices concerned to create the specific list of Fish and Meat products whose tariffs can be reduced to zero.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-14
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-09-12)2. Bravo (M.) (000 2018-09-13)
3. Tambunting (000 2018-12-12)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-08-15
